Synopsis:
---------
Year 2027:the human being is on the verge of extinction:men have lost the ability to procreate and ignored reason why all women in the world have become sterile.At the same time, the world is shaken when a boy dies 18, the youngest person on Earth. A situation of rampant chaos , as lives.In such circumstances , Theo (Clive Owen), a disillusioned former radical activist turned bureaucrat London, is hired by Julian (Julianne Moore) to protect the most searched person on Earth ...
